attributes.action: halt the process of The County, South Shields, becomming a family friendly restaurant.  It's a pub it's not for grub.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A popular local public house is due to be rebranded as a family friendly Sizzler eaterie, much against the wishes of the vast majority of the local community. This cannot be allowed to happen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
